verbs.description: ryan [V: reynolds] samuel l jackson to return for ‘ hitman bodyguard’ sequel ryan reynolds samuel l jackson and salma hayek are officially returning for a hitman bodyguard sequel lionsgate will release the hitman wife bodyguard in north america the studio announced thursday at the american film market in santa monica calif where millennium media is handling sales the original movie was released in late summer of 2017 and grossed 75 5 million stateside and more than 180 million globally santa monica jonathan yunger avi lerner millennium media north america gary oldman london campbell grobman films amalfi coast international court of justice samuel l jackson brandon boaz davidson joe drake les weldon michael bryce campbell grobman calif eda kowan christa campbell salma hayek lions gate entertainment matt o’toole ryan reynolds trevor short netherlands lionsgate phillip murphy jeffrey greenstein samuel l jackson patrick hughes jason constantine

ryan reynolds samuel l jackson to [V: return] [ARGM-PRP: for ‘ hitman bodyguard’ sequel ryan reynolds samuel l jackson and salma hayek] are officially returning for a hitman bodyguard sequel lionsgate will release the hitman wife bodyguard in north america the studio announced thursday at the american film market in santa monica calif where millennium media is handling sales the original movie was released in late summer of 2017 and grossed 75 5 million stateside and more than 180 million globally santa monica jonathan yunger avi lerner millennium media north america gary oldman london campbell grobman films amalfi coast international court of justice samuel l jackson brandon boaz davidson joe drake les weldon michael bryce campbell grobman calif eda kowan christa campbell salma hayek lions gate entertainment matt o’toole ryan reynolds trevor short netherlands lionsgate phillip murphy jeffrey greenstein samuel l jackson patrick hughes jason constantine
